attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to speak in the house of commons when he visits the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Obama armed terrorists & dropped more bombs than any President in History. He also signed an executive order specifically for those countries to be on the list used by Trump, he was allowed to speak.

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.cnn.com/cnn/2017/01/29/politics/how-the-trump-administration-chose-the-7-countries/index.html?client=ms-android-att-us

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/us-news/2017/jan/26/tulsi-gabbard-bashar-al-assad-syria-democrats?client=ms-android-att-us
attributes.background: We believe that The President, Donald J Trump should be allowed to address The House of Commons and given the full respect of everyone inside. He should be given the chance to be heard like previous Presidents before him who bombed the Middle East and used tougher immigration policies themselves.
